tool_description:
Generate asynchronous conversation endpoints for the OpenAI ChatGPT API.

The OffloadGPT API is a server-side API client that manages OpenAI ChatGPT API requests.

You can find the complete documentation here:
https://offloadgpt-docs.microdeploy.com/

You can see a demo of the capabilities of this API here:
https://github.com/pauiglesias/offload-chatgpt-streaming-demo

A complete OpenAPI 3.0 specification:
https://app.swaggerhub.com/apis-docs/microdeploy/OffloadGPT/1.0.0
name: OffloadGPT
title: OffloadGPT

api_list.name: Stream ChatGPT
api_list.description: Generates URLs for status and streaming responses that can be accessed directly through your browser, being updated as they receive data from the OpenAI API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://offloadgpt.p.rapidapi.com/v1/stream-chatgpt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "offloadgpt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Async ChatGPT
api_list.description: Generates the status URL that is updated when the ChatGPT response is received.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://offloadgpt.p.rapidapi.com/v1/async-chatgpt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "offloadgpt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
